import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Edit Device Configuration Parameter"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/integration/network/{deviceID}/params"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Edit a device configuration parameter using the Network-token. At this point, you must already have the device ID.

You can get the Device ID by resolving the device-token and using the /info route to get details on the Device.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"deviceID","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"id":{"type":"string","example":"6114b901cd09d0fa0013636afcc"},"key":{"type":"string","example":"downlink_url"},"sent":{"type":"boolean","example":true},"value":{"type":"string","example":"https://mydownlink.url.io"}}},"example":[{"id":"6114b901cd09d0fa0013636afcc","key":"downlink_url","sent":true,"value":"https://mydownlink.url.io"}]},"examples":{"Edit Device Configuration Parameter":{"value":[{"id":"6114b901cd09d0fa0013636afcc","key":"downlink_url","sent":true,"value":"https://mydownlink.url.io"}]}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Edit the configuration parameter","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"result":{"type":"string","example":"Device Configuration Parameter Updated"},"status":{"type":"boolean","example":true}}}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
